options.name: Unrelenting
options.description: The Minotaur culture is one where things change slowly, if at all, giving them a reputation of legendary stubborness. Gain +1 Resilience and +1 Strength

options.name: Reaction : Blood Fury
options.description: In response to being the Target of a True Hit that deals Physical Damage, you enter a Blood Fury until you make your next Melee Attack. If the Attack hits, it is automatically upgraded to a True Hit. Until you make that Attack, you automatically fail all Defense Checks.

options.name: The Dark Heresy
options.description: The Minotaur culture have a long and storied history with Entities of the dark. Learn 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Fiend Spells.

options.name: Bond with Death
options.description: The Minotaur culture does not fear death and is trained to endure under the harshest of conditions. You act normally within Lifeline until reaching 2 Lifeline Points. Additionally, you cannot be Frightened and do not suffer the effects of Exhaustion while in Lifeline.

options.name: Hard Headed
options.description: The Minotaur culture settles many disputes by bashing heads together and clashing skulls. You can no longer unwillingly become Unconscious.

options.name: Legacy of Axes
options.description: The axe is the weapon of the Minotaur people and they honor that legacy. Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Slashing Weapons

options.name: Brutal Fighter
options.description: You gain Critical Hits with all Melee and Ranged Weapons
